title: Generative AI on Vertex AI - Use the Vertex AI SDK to tune models
abstract:
# Generative AI on Vertex AI - Use the Vertex AI SDK to tune models
You can use the Vertex AI SDK to tune most models that support tuning. Not all foundation models that support tuning can be tuned using the Vertex AI SDK. To tune a model, run the `tune_model` method on the model object. The `tune_model` method supports [supervised tuning](/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/models/tune-models#supervised-tunings_url) and doesn't support [reinforcement learning from human feedback (RLHF) tuning](/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/models/tune-models#rlhf-tunings_url) . For details about using Vertex AI to tune a model, see [Tune language foundation models](/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/models/tune-models) . For a more complete sample of how to tune a text generation model using the Vertex AI SDK, see [Create a text model supervised tuning job](/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/models/tune-text-models-supervised#generative-ai-tune-model-python_vertex_ai_sdk) .
content:
## Tune a text generation foundation model
The following steps demonstrate how to use the Vertex AI SDK to tune the text generation foundation model.
- Call the [from_pretrained](/python/docs/reference/aiplatform/latest/vertexai.language_models.TextGenerationModel#vertexai_language_models_TextGenerationModel_from_pretrained) method to load a version of the text foundation model. The following loads the most current [stable version](/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/learn/model-versioning#stable-version) of the text generation foundation model:```
my_text_generation_model = TextGenerationModel.from_pretrained("text-bison@002")
```
- Run the [tune_model](/python/docs/reference/aiplatform/latest/vertexai.language_models.TextGenerationModel#vertexai_language_models_TextGenerationModel_tune_model) method to tune your text generation model. [tune_model](/python/docs/reference/aiplatform/latest/vertexai.language_models.TextGenerationModel#vertexai_language_models_TextGenerationModel_tune_model) launches a model tuning job and then immediately returns a tuning job object. To make this documentation simple, the parameters in the following code snippet are replaced by an ellipsis ( `...` ). To learn about the parameters, see the [tune_model method definition](/python/docs/reference/aiplatform/latest/vertexai.language_models.TextGenerationModel#vertexai_language_models_TextGenerationModel_tune_model) in the [language model section of the Vertex AI SDK reference guide](/python/docs/reference/aiplatform/latest/vertexai.language_models) .```
tuning_job = my_text_generation_model.tune_model(...)
```
- Run the [get_tuned_model](/python/docs/reference/aiplatform/latest/vertexai.language_models.TextGenerationModel#vertexai_language_models_TextGenerationModel_get_tuned_model) method on the tuning job to get the tuned model. [get_tuned_model](/python/docs/reference/aiplatform/latest/vertexai.language_models.TextGenerationModel#vertexai_language_models_TextGenerationModel_get_tuned_model) waits for the tuning job that was started by `tune_model` to complete before it returns a tuned model.```
tuned_model = tuning_job.get_tuned_model()
```
- After you tune a model, use the [list_tuned_model_names](/python/docs/reference/aiplatform/latest/vertexai.language_models.TextGenerationModel#vertexai_language_models_TextGenerationModel_list_tuned_model_names) method to view tuned models. [list_tuned_model_names](/python/docs/reference/aiplatform/latest/vertexai.language_models.TextGenerationModel#vertexai_language_models_TextGenerationModel_list_tuned_model_names) returns tuned models that are of the same model type as the object that called it. For example, if you call [list_tuned_model_names](/python/docs/reference/aiplatform/latest/vertexai.language_models.TextGenerationModel#vertexai_language_models_TextGenerationModel_list_tuned_model_names) on the `TextGenerationModel.from_pretrained("text-bison@002")` model object, then only tuned versions of the `text-bison@002` model are returned. The following returns the names of tuned text generation models:```
text_generaton_model = TextGenerationModel.from_pretrained("text-bison@002")text_generaton_model.list_tuned_model_names()
```## What's next
- Learn how to [use text model classes and the Vertex AI SDK](/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/sdk-for-llm/sdk-use-text-models) .
- Learn how to [use code model classes and the Vertex AI SDK](/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/sdk-for-llm/sdk-use-code-models) .
- Learn about [Vertex AI SDK classes not related to generative AI](/vertex-ai/docs/python-sdk/python-sdk-class-overview) .
